about_the_game:
Join the Section Gamma Psi-Elite-Club to unlock premium features and expand your gameplay experience. This DLC includes a permanent membership with the following features:

  • Play 10 simultaneous matches
  • 6 week game retention
  • Access 2+ singleplayer scenarios
  • Exclusive avatars
  • Supporter club member profile badge
  • No ads when playing on mobile or tablet
  • Your username mentioned in the game's credits
  • Supports development of new features

content_descriptors.notes: This game depicts a fictional war between factions in a sci-fi setting.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Join the Section Gamma Psi-Elite-Club to unlock premium features, expand your gameplay experience and support further development of the game!
